claim: Mathematical methods will enable precise mapping of all territory
actual_outcome: Methods work in stable territory; fail in unstable regions
lessons: Methods that work somewhere may fail elsewhere; domain matters

claim: Seasonal patterns will enable reliable creature forecasting
actual_outcome: Correlations found but accuracy insufficient for field deployment
lessons: Correlation is not prediction; biological systems resist simple models

claim: New methods will definitively date any manuscript
actual_outcome: Methods improved but uncertainty remains for most documents
lessons: Physical methods have inherent limits; uncertainty is often irreducible

claim: Engineering interventions can stabilize Dens boundaries
actual_outcome: All attempts failed; boundaries proved resistant to intervention
lessons: Some phenomena cannot be controlled; management may be best option

claim: Citation networks will establish scholarly authority
actual_outcome: Networks created; gaming and manipulation became issues
lessons: Metrics can be gamed; quantification creates new problems

claim: Archives will be fully automated within 30 years
actual_outcome: Archives still employ clerks; automation assists but does not replace
lessons: Automation augments human work; rarely replaces entirely

claim: Systematic observation will improve trapper safety
actual_outcome: Calendar widely adopted; modest but real safety improvement
lessons: Description without prediction can still be valuable

claim: Complete taxonomy will enable systematic creature management
actual_outcome: Taxonomy created but creatures don't follow categories consistently
lessons: Classification is useful shorthand; reality is messier than categories

claim: Simple tethering will reduce fall fatalities
actual_outcome: Fatalities significantly reduced; technology widely adopted
lessons: Simple solutions sometimes work; not everything needs complexity

claim: Expert examination will identify all forgeries
actual_outcome: Mink Pavar forgeries detected; unknown number may remain undiscovered
lessons: Detection improves but never reaches certainty; some forgeries succeed

claim: Prime patterns govern creature behavior cycles
actual_outcome: Patterns observed but mechanism unclear; predictive power limited
lessons: Patterns exist; causation harder to establish than correlation

claim: Moat will create buffer zone and provide early warning
actual_outcome: Moat slows boundary drift and enables warning; does not stop it
lessons: Managing problems is valid even without solving them

claim: Codified procedures will prevent expedition disasters
actual_outcome: Ninth Expedition disaster showed limits of early protocols
lessons: Codification helps in known conditions; novel conditions require judgment

claim: Standardized records will reveal trading patterns
actual_outcome: Records collected; patterns emerged but with significant noise
lessons: Data collection precedes insight; insight requires interpretation

claim: Mechanical counting will enable complete population tracking
actual_outcome: Counting improved; population behavior remained complex
lessons: Counting is easier than understanding; numbers don't explain themselves

claim: Standard equipment will reduce equipment-related failures
actual_outcome: Equipment failures reduced; human error remained primary cause
lessons: Equipment improvement helps; human factors dominate outcomes

claim: Structured vocational training will guarantee employment
actual_outcome: Training improved skills; employment depends on many factors
lessons: Training is necessary but not sufficient; outcomes have multiple causes

claim: Comprehensive indexing will make all documents findable
actual_outcome: Indexing improved access; some documents remain misfiled or lost
lessons: Better organization helps; perfect organization is unattainable

claim: Regular surveys will map stable vs unstable regions definitively
actual_outcome: Surveys inform but stability changes over time; boundaries shift
lessons: Snapshot surveys miss dynamic processes; continuous monitoring needed

claim: Network will enable real-time coordination across regions
actual_outcome: Network established but delays and failures common
lessons: Infrastructure enables but doesn't guarantee coordination; cultural factors matter
